title: CES 2026 exclusive: Samsung lays out its AI blueprint for Indian homes
description: Samsung is bringing artificial intelligence to all its devices, not just phones. This AI will adapt to Indian needs, understanding local languages, food, and clothing. Samsung is also making appliances upgradable through software.
content:

title: CES 2026 Sees AI Industry Shift Focus from Hardware to AI Product Deployment
description: **media[897530]**LAS VEGAS, Jan. 13, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- At CES 2026, industry discussions around artificial intelligence are moving beyond hardware innovation and toward the challenges of taking AI-native products from launch to global adoption. This shift was a central theme at 'CES 2026: Builders, Brands and Beers', a side event co-hosted by Subotiz and global founder community Seamate, featuring insights from Jeff Li, Founder and CEO of Subotiz. Founders, product leaders, investors, and industry observers gathered at the event to share insights on how AI-native products can succeed globally beyond launch and ongoing technical advancements. With AI hardware becoming more widely available, attendees observed that competitive advantage increasingly depends on operations, software experience, and monetization models that support global growth.
content: LAS VEGAS, Jan. 13, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- At CES 2026, industry discussions around artificial intelligence are moving beyond hardware innovation and toward the challenges of taking AI-native products from launch to global adoption. This shift was a ce... [1948 chars]

title: Apple calls on Google to help smarten up Siri and bring other AI features to the iPhone
description: By MICHAEL LIEDTKE Apple will rely on Google to help finish its efforts to smarten up its virtual assistant Siri and bring other artificial intelligence features to the iPhone as the trendsetting company plays catch up in technology’s latest craze. title: This earnings season is still all about AI. That won’t last.
description: A wider range of companies are likely to contribute to 2026’s market gains as the economy holds steady and investors exit riskier artificial intelligence bets.

title: Prosecutors Say Ex Google Engineer Stole AI Secrets and Pitched Them to China

title: Ecolab Watermark™ 2025 Study Finds Smarter Water Use Key to India's AI Future
description: Mumbai (Maharashtra) [India], January 13: Ecolab, a global sustainability leader in water solutions and services, today announced the India findings from its third annual Ecolab Watermark™ Study, which explores how people perceive water challenges and the role of business in solving them. This year's research connects water stewardship to one of the region's fastest-growing industries, artificial intelligence (AI), revealing that while India leads global optimism on the promise of AI, awareness of its hidden water impact remains limited.
